Container.Name: Quasarr
Container.Overview: Quasarr connects JDownloader with Radarr, Sonarr and LazyLibrarian. It also decrypts links protected by CAPTCHAs.

Config.Name: Web UI for solving CAPTCHAs manually
Config.Description: Port for web UI and API access

Config.Name: Internal Address
Config.Description: Required! Must include protocol and port. Must be reachable by Radarr/Sonarr/LazyLibrarian.

Config.Name: External Address
Config.Description: Optional. Used for reverse proxy setup. Always protect external access with basic auth!

Config.Name: Discord Webhook
Config.Description: Optional. Set a valid Discord webhook URL for notifications.

Config.Name: Hostnames URL
Config.Description: Optional. Public plain text URL (e.g. Pastebin raw link) containing valid hostnames for Quasarr.

Config.Name: Silent Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to silence all Discord notifications except SponsorsHelper errors.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to enable debug logging.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Optional. Set your timezone. Wrong timezone can cause HTTPS/SSL issues.
